featured.text: However, Vaaler’s clips were not the same as the paperclips currently in use.
This clip is therefore sometimes 36 the Gem clip.
Nowadays, it is performed in movies and music clips.
With this feature, it could be stretched and 33 various clip-like objects.

definition.en_def: A device used for holding things together or a short segment of video or audio.
definition.example: She used a clip to hold the papers together.
